text_simple: i felt drawn to the name

name: skywrath_crown_item_012
text: I'll tear the life from their flesh.
text_simple: ill tear the life from their flesh

name: skywrath_crown_item_017
text: I thought we didn't have to pay for this.
text_simple: i thought we didnt have to pay for this

name: skywrath_crown_item_021
text: Tear the body and rend the soul.
text_simple: tear the body and rend the soul

name: skywrath_crown_item_024
text: By magic or by martial arts, I will kill them all.
text_simple: by magic or by martial arts i will kill them all

name: skywrath_crown_item_026
text: Don't underestimate the primal power of a drum.
text_simple: dont underestimate the primal power of a drum

name: skywrath_crown_item_029
text: I'd be a fool to forget this.
text_simple: id be a fool to forget this

name: skywrath_crown_item_031
text: Do they think they can fly?
text_simple: do they think they can fly

name: skywrath_crown_item_034
text: Now we trust what we see.
text_simple: now we trust what we see

name: skywrath_crown_item_035
text: I know a better ghost story.
text_simple: i know a better ghost story

name: skywrath_crown_item_038
text: We must be ready to bleed.
text_simple: we must be ready to bleed

name: skywrath_crown_item_040
text: Everyone surrenders their weapon if they want to meet the queen.
text_simple: everyone surrenders their weapon if they want to meet the queen

name: skywrath_crown_item_042
text: More than just a relic, it seems.
text_simple: more than just a relic it seems

name: skywrath_crown_item_043
text: I have nothing left to prove.
text_simple: i have nothing left to prove

name: skywrath_crown_item_044
text: In the eye of the storm, I thrive.
text_simple: in the eye of the storm i thrive

name: skywrath_crown_item_046
text: Let me never part from it.
text_simple: let me never part from it

name: skywrath_crown_item_051
text: I might not like what I see.
text_simple: i might not like what i see

name: skywrath_crown_item_052
text: I thought I'd left madness behind.
text_simple: i thought id left madness behind

name: skywrath_crown_item_053
text: You can pin it on my chest.
text_simple: you can pin it on my chest

name: skywrath_crown_item_054
text: Prepare for blood and we might just survive.
text_simple: prepare for blood and we might just survive

name: skywrath_crown_item_056
text: Hmm. It doesn't feel balanced to me.
text_simple: hmm it doesnt feel balanced to me

name: skywrath_crown_item_060
text: To stand watch in my place.
text_simple: to stand watch in my place

name: skywrath_crown_item_061
text: My core thrumbs to be near it.
text_simple: my core thrumbs to be near it

name: skywrath_crown_item_064
text: A poor substitute for study and experience.
text_simple: a poor substitute for study and experience

name: skywrath_crown_item_068
text: I choose the time and place.
text_simple: i choose the time and place

name: skywrath_crown_item_083
text: More powerful magic than you might think.
text_simple: more powerful magic than you might think

name: skywrath_crown_item_085
text: A fair price for such a tool.
text_simple: a fair price for such a tool

name: skywrath_crown_item_095
text: To be honest, I never liked the flavor.
text_simple: to be honest i never liked the flavor

name: skywrath_crown_item_096
text: I need a full suit. No boots.
text_simple: i need a full suit no boots

name: skywrath_crown_item_098
text: I'm not afraid of its origins.
text_simple: im not afraid of its origins

name: skywrath_crown_item_099
text: For the safety of Skywrath, I would don even this.
text_simple: for the safety of skywrath i would don even this

name: skywrath_crown_item_100
text: Let us not make the same mistakes as the maker of this blade.
text_simple: let us not make the same mistakes as the maker of this blade

name: skywrath_crown_item_101
text: They say this held The Beast?
text_simple: they say this held the beast

name: skywrath_crown_item_102
text: The gale works in my favor for a change.
text_simple: the gale works in my favor for a change

name: skywrath_crown_item_103
text: The darkness in their hearts will destroy them.
text_simple: the darkness in their hearts will destroy them

name: skywrath_crown_item_104
text: Better than it be used against me.
text_simple: better than it be used against me

name: skywrath_crown_item_109
text: Of course I want them. But how do they fit?
text_simple: of course i want them but how do they fit

name: skywrath_crown_item_110
text: There's a dark energy to this.
text_simple: theres a dark energy to this

name: skywrath_crown_item_112
text: A crown that opens many doors.
text_simple: a crown that opens many doors

name: skywrath_crown_item_113
text: All my needs will be sated.
text_simple: all my needs will be sated

name: skywrath_crown_item_114
text: I have a duty to my people.
text_simple: i have a duty to my people

name: skywrath_crown_item_115
text: The perfect augmentation of my powers.
text_simple: the perfect augmentation of my powers

name: skywrath_crown_item_117
text: I'm not as practiced with the blade.
text_simple: im not as practiced with the blade

name: skywrath_crown_item_118
text: I'll wear this crown, but I swear no oath.
text_simple: ill wear this crown but i swear no oath

name: skywrath_crown_item_121
text: You expect me to use my fists?
text_simple: you expect me to use my fists

name: skywrath_crown_itemcommon_01
text: There's still space on the shelf.
text_simple: theres still space on the shelf

name: skywrath_crown_itemmoderate_02
text: Now this is a useful thing.
text_simple: now this is a useful thing

name: skywrath_crown_itemrare_01
text: I give true thanks for this.
text_simple: i give true thanks for this

name: skywrath_crown_jugg_ally_01
text: Quietly, I dream of a future in which Scree'auk and Avilliva SHARE the love and worship of our people.
text_simple: quietly i dream of a future in which screeauk and avilliva share the love and worship of our people

name: skywrath_crown_jugg_ally_02
text: Some of what Scree'auk offers comes with a hidden price...
text_simple: some of what screeauk offers comes with a hidden price

name: skywrath_crown_jugg_ally_03
text: May you find your other, as I have.
text_simple: may you find your other as i have

name: skywrath_crown_jugg_ally_04
text: I hope you find another from the sunken Isle, my friend.
text_simple: i hope you find another from the sunken isle my friend

name: skywrath_crown_jugg_rival_01
text: Few these days fight with honor. You died well.
text_simple: few these days fight with honor you died well

name: skywrath_crown_jugg_rival_02
text: I shall remember you fondly, if not this fight.
text_simple: i shall remember you fondly if not this fight

name: skywrath_crown_kill_01
text: I send another soul to Scree'auk.
text_simple: i send another soul to screeauk

name: skywrath_crown_kill_02
text: And with that, you fly no longer.
text_simple: and with that you fly no longer

name: skywrath_crown_kill_03
text: You should never have challenged me.
text_simple: you should never have challenged me

name: skywrath_crown_kill_04
text: I claim this life in Scree'auk's name.
text_simple: i claim this life in screeauks name

name: skywrath_crown_kill_06
text: To the soil from whence you came.
text_simple: to the soil from whence you came

name: skywrath_crown_kill_07
text: I gave you a chance. What more did you want?
text_simple: i gave you a chance what more did you want

name: skywrath_crown_kill_08
text: I gave you a chance. You wasted it.
text_simple: i gave you a chance you wasted it

name: skywrath_crown_kill_09
text: Your life is mine. Take this death in exchange.
text_simple: your life is mine take this death in exchange

name: skywrath_crown_kill_10
text: As happens to all light, yours is extinguished.
text_simple: as happens to all light yours is extinguished

name: skywrath_crown_kill_11
text: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
text_simple: ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha

name: skywrath_crown_kill_12
text: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
text_simple: ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha

name: skywrath_crown_kill_13
text: I took no joy in that. Well, SOME joy.
text_simple: i took no joy in that well some joy

name: skywrath_crown_kill_17
text: You dare challenge a master mage?
text_simple: you dare challenge a master mage

name: skywrath_crown_kill_18
text: Your hubris called for much worse.
text_simple: your hubris called for much worse

name: skywrath_crown_kill_19
text: I have no patience for a prisoner today.
text_simple: i have no patience for a prisoner today

name: skywrath_crown_kill_21
text: All I do, I do in Her name.
text_simple: all i do i do in her name

name: skywrath_crown_kill_22
text: I use my powers wisely. Take that as you will.
text_simple: i use my powers wisely take that as you will

name: skywrath_crown_lasthit_17
text: That should weigh on me more than this...
text_simple: that should weigh on me more than this

name: skywrath_crown_lasthit_18
text: I do this because I must.
text_simple: i do this because i must

text: A pittance for what I have endured.

name: skywrath_crown_lasthit_pain_07
text: Something to pay the healer with.

name: skywrath_crown_levelup_03
text: New power flows to my wingtips.
text_simple: new power flows to my wingtips

name: skywrath_crown_levelup_06
text: My power grows greater, my wings wider,
text_simple: my power grows greater my wings wider

name: skywrath_crown_levelup_07
text: The higher I go, the smaller all seems.
text_simple: the higher i go the smaller all seems

name: skywrath_crown_levelup_09
text: My prowess grows. So too my victories.
text_simple: my prowess grows so too my victories

name: skywrath_crown_levelup_10
text: There's no end to how high I can fly.
text_simple: theres no end to how high i can fly

name: skywrath_crown_levelup_11
text: By the mists of the arcane, I grow stronger!
text_simple: by the mists of the arcane i grow stronger

name: skywrath_crown_levelup_12
text: All the better to defeat my foes.
text_simple: all the better to defeat my foes

name: skywrath_crown_levelup_15
text: Scree'auk, help guide the course of my wings.
text_simple: screeauk help guide the course of my wings

name: skywrath_crown_levelup_17
text: Excellent, yes. But we need more.
text_simple: excellent yes but we need more

name: skywrath_crown_levelup_18
text: The truth of my heart shall be writ upon the skies.
text_simple: the truth of my heart shall be writ upon the skies

name: skywrath_crown_levelup_19
text: Ah, Scree'auk, your blood enthralls me!
text_simple: ah screeauk your blood enthralls me

name: skywrath_crown_lion_rival_01
text: Poor stolen demon hand - attached to a weak coward.
text_simple: poor stolen demon hand attached to a weak coward

name: skywrath_crown_lion_rival_02
text: I'd be lion if I said you fought well, dead man.
text_simple: id be lion if i said you fought well dead man

name: skywrath_crown_lion_rival_03
text: Go to hell and stay there.
text_simple: go to hell and stay there

name: skywrath_crown_lose_01
text: How could it all be for nothing?
text_simple: how could it all be for nothing

name: skywrath_crown_lose_02
text: I thought we finally had a chance...
text_simple: i thought we finally had a chance

name: skywrath_crown_lotuspool_01
text: Before my foes can make use of this.
text_simple: before my foes can make use of this

name: skywrath_crown_lotuspool_04
text: I take this for Scree'auk. And me.
text_simple: i take this for screeauk and me

name: skywrath_crown_meepo_ally_01
text: You should avoid Skywrath. There may still be a price on your head.
text_simple: you should avoid skywrath there may still be a price on your head

name: skywrath_crown_meepo_ally_02
text: It's one scrape to the next for you.
text_simple: its one scrape to the next for you

name: skywrath_crown_meepo_ally_03
text: Still gambling with dangerous people? That kind of life will be your end.
text_simple: still gambling with dangerous people that kind of life will be your end

name: skywrath_crown_meepo_ally_04
text: We meet again, Meepos. And we WILL have words after the battle.
text_simple: we meet again meepos and we will have words after the battle

name: skywrath_crown_meepo_ally_05
text: We did not part on good terms, Meepos. But for today, I call a truce.
text_simple: we did not part on good terms meepos but for today i call a truce

name: skywrath_crown_meepo_rival_01
text: Justice is not always swift, but it will find you. Or I will.
text_simple: justice is not always swift but it will find you or i will

name: skywrath_crown_meepo_rival_02
text: TEN of you would be nothing to one skywrath mage.
text_simple: ten of you would be nothing to one skywrath mage

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_a_02
text: I see it in the faces of my fellow Queensguard.
text_simple: i see it in the faces of my fellow queensguard

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_a_03
text: Just as they see all of that from me.
text_simple: just as they see all of that from me

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_a_04
text: We who failed, who ignored, who were complicit...
text_simple: we who failed who ignored who were complicit

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_a_05
text: In the fall of my beloved Shen.
text_simple: in the fall of my beloved shen

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_a_06
text: But now I have something that changes everything.
text_simple: but now i have something that changes everything

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_a_07
text: A source of power free from Imperia's leash.
text_simple: a source of power free from imperias leash

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_a_08
text: And those in the highest nests of the Eyrie are about to witness something they've never before seen from me.
text_simple: and those in the highest nests of the eyrie are about to witness something theyve never before seen from me

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_b_01
text: For so long, I served Imperia.
text_simple: for so long i served imperia

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_b_02
text: But in my heart, Shen was my true queen.
text_simple: but in my heart shen was my true queen

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_b_03
text: Once a year, I would summon her shade.
text_simple: once a year i would summon her shade

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_b_04
text: And together we'd dream of what I feared may never come to be.
text_simple: and together wed dream of what i feared may never come to be

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_b_05
text: But Scree'auk has seen fit to bless us.
text_simple: but screeauk has seen fit to bless us

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_b_06
text: To make our dreams a reality.
text_simple: to make our dreams a reality

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_b_07
text: And a living nightmare for Imperia -- and all who serve the false queen.
text_simple: and a living nightmare for imperia and all who serve the false queen

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_c_03
text: Then what of those who take a crown by treason?
text_simple: then what of those who take a crown by treason

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_c_04
text: My oath is to that crown.
text_simple: my oath is to that crown

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_c_05
text: Not to the usurper's head upon which it rests.
text_simple: not to the usurpers head upon which it rests

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_c_06
text: Imperia, you've had that crown too long.
text_simple: imperia youve had that crown too long

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_c_07
text: Now it's time I have your head.
text_simple: now its time i have your head

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_d_03
text: Only I guard the true queen.
text_simple: only i guard the true queen

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_d_04
text: Till now I've guarded her memory.
text_simple: till now ive guarded her memory

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_d_05
text: And the promise of what can be.
text_simple: and the promise of what can be

name: skywrath_crown_monologue_d_06
text: Now, by Scree'auk, I guard her life again!
text_simple: now by screeauk i guard her life again

name: skywrath_crown_move_09
text: Where I fly, who can follow?
text_simple: where i fly who can follow

name: skywrath_crown_move_13
text: Your command echoes in my wings
text_simple: your command echoes in my wings

name: skywrath_crown_move_32
text: You'll have no cause to question me.
text_simple: youll have no cause to question me

name: skywrath_crown_move_pain_02
text: Honor compels me to carry on.
text_simple: honor compels me to carry on

name: skywrath_crown_move_pain_04
text: I shall not be stopped so easily.
text_simple: i shall not be stopped so easily

name: skywrath_crown_move_pain_05
text: With aid from Scree'auk, I move.
text_simple: with aid from screeauk i move

name: skywrath_crown_move_pain_07
text: Rest is a luxury I don't have now.
text_simple: rest is a luxury i dont have now

name: skywrath_crown_move_pain_08
text: Think of victory and keep going.
text_simple: think of victory and keep going

name: skywrath_crown_move_pain_09
text: As long as I can continue, I must.
text_simple: as long as i can continue i must

name: skywrath_crown_mystic_flare_02
text: May the light tear through you!
text_simple: may the light tear through you

name: skywrath_crown_mystic_flare_08
text: The heavens pour death upon you.
text_simple: the heavens pour death upon you

name: skywrath_crown_mystic_flare_10
text: The light of pain upon you!
text_simple: the light of pain upon you

name: skywrath_crown_naturesprophet_rival_01
text: You didn't have the seeds, plant-man.
text_simple: you didnt have the seeds plantman

name: skywrath_crown_naturesprophet_rival_02
text: You'll be more helpful in this forest as mulch.
text_simple: youll be more helpful in this forest as mulch

name: skywrath_crown_outpost_02
text: This is where our victory banner will fly.
text_simple: this is where our victory banner will fly

name: skywrath_crown_pudge_ally_01
text: Gods. How much flesh can this thing eat?
text_simple: gods how much flesh can this thing eat

name: skywrath_crown_pudge_ally_02
text: With all due respect, please eat your kills out of my sight.
text_simple: with all due respect please eat your kills out of my sight

name: skywrath_crown_pudge_ally_03
text: It's the flightless eater. Tell me... do they taste like chicken?
text_simple: its the flightless eater tell me do they taste like chicken

name: skywrath_crown_pudge_rival_01
text: Better to kill you here then let you wander back to Skywrath.
text_simple: better to kill you here then let you wander back to skywrath

name: skywrath_crown_pudge_rival_02
text: Why do such tasks always fall to me?
text_simple: why do such tasks always fall to me

name: skywrath_crown_pudge_rival_03
text: You're meat for worms, filthy butcher.
text_simple: youre meat for worms filthy butcher

name: skywrath_crown_pudge_rival_04
text: You smelled like rotten meat BEFORE you died.
text_simple: you smelled like rotten meat before you died

name: skywrath_crown_purch_01
text: In Scree'auk's name, for her glory.
text_simple: in screeauks name for her glory

name: skywrath_crown_purch_02
text: This shall help us meet our aim.
text_simple: this shall help us meet our aim

name: skywrath_crown_purch_03
text: Currency is worthless. This, on the other hand...
text_simple: currency is worthless this on the other hand

name: skywrath_crown_purch_04
text: Gold buys power, but not the wisdom to wield it.
text_simple: gold buys power but not the wisdom to wield it

name: skywrath_crown_purch_05
text: Not for myself but for the cause.
text_simple: not for myself but for the cause

name: skywrath_crown_purch_06
text: No cost too great if it serves the greater purpose.
text_simple: no cost too great if it serves the greater purpose

name: skywrath_crown_regen_02
text: My strength, regained. My wings, restored.
text_simple: my strength regained my wings restored

name: skywrath_crown_respawn_03
text: I have unfinished business to attend to.
text_simple: i have unfinished business to attend to

name: skywrath_crown_respawn_04
text: By Scree'auk's mercy, I have returned.
text_simple: by screeauks mercy i have returned

name: skywrath_crown_respawn_05
text: The Nest of Thorns gives me new life.
text_simple: the nest of thorns gives me new life

name: skywrath_crown_respawn_06
text: My blood, once spilled, has returned to this vessel.
text_simple: my blood once spilled has returned to this vessel

name: skywrath_crown_respawn_07
text: My wounds were grave. But now, I return for blood.
text_simple: my wounds were grave but now i return for blood

name: skywrath_crown_respawn_08
text: By the Ghastly Eyrie, I fly again.
text_simple: by the ghastly eyrie i fly again

name: skywrath_crown_respawn_09
text: This time, I will do justice to her name.
text_simple: this time i will do justice to her name

name: skywrath_crown_respawn_10
text: I shall not fail her this time.
text_simple: i shall not fail her this time

name: skywrath_crown_respawn_11
text: A queensguard's oath is not ended by death.
text_simple: a queensguards oath is not ended by death

name: skywrath_crown_respawn_14
text: My honor knows no bounds. Not even death.
text_simple: my honor knows no bounds not even death

name: skywrath_crown_respawn_15
text: The workings of Scree'auk, or some other strange curse?
text_simple: the workings of screeauk or some other strange curse

name: skywrath_crown_respawn_16
text: A fair point. But it seems I have more to say on it.
text_simple: a fair point but it seems i have more to say on it

name: skywrath_crown_respawn_18
text: Power comes from the heart, and now mine beats anew.
text_simple: power comes from the heart and now mine beats anew

name: skywrath_crown_riki_ally_01
text: Here, help yourself to some of my lunch.
text_simple: here help yourself to some of my lunch

name: skywrath_crown_riki_ally_02
text: I have some family recipes I wanted to share with you. Guard them with your life.
text_simple: i have some family recipes i wanted to share with you guard them with your life

name: skywrath_crown_riki_ally_03
text: Is that your new blade? Very nice.
text_simple: is that your new blade very nice

name: skywrath_crown_riki_ally_04
text: Let's put that new blade of yours to good use.
text_simple: lets put that new blade of yours to good use

name: skywrath_crown_riki_rival_01
text: You fought like a coward, and died worse than that.
text_simple: you fought like a coward and died worse than that

name: skywrath_crown_riki_rival_02
text: I knew when I first saw you that it might come to this.
text_simple: i knew when i first saw you that it might come to this

name: skywrath_crown_rival_001
text: Avernus has made a pawn of you.
text_simple: avernus has made a pawn of you

name: skywrath_crown_rival_007
text: Madness consumes you. Let death set you free.
text_simple: madness consumes you let death set you free

name: skywrath_crown_rival_008
text: Your mind was filled with poison -- hypocracy and lies.
text_simple: your mind was filled with poison hypocracy and lies

name: skywrath_crown_rival_009
text: Lesser Ancients are the first to fall.
text_simple: lesser ancients are the first to fall

name: skywrath_crown_rival_011
text: Your own people will celebrate your death.
text_simple: your own people will celebrate your death

name: skywrath_crown_rival_013
text: My powers are beyond your grip.
text_simple: my powers are beyond your grip

name: skywrath_crown_rival_017
text: Carrion is carrion. I say let them feast.
text_simple: carrion is carrion i say let them feast

name: skywrath_crown_rival_033
text: No one will mourn a knight of the fold. Not even the other knights.
text_simple: no one will mourn a knight of the fold not even the other knights

name: skywrath_crown_rival_063
text: You lost your say long ago.
text_simple: you lost your say long ago

name: skywrath_crown_rival_067
text: I'm not some easily charmed beast.
text_simple: im not some easily charmed beast

name: skywrath_crown_rival_071
text: I've read stories about the powers of your kind. It seems they were misleading.
text_simple: ive read stories about the powers of your kind it seems they were misleading

name: skywrath_crown_rival_073
text: The spirits of your people howl for revenge.
text_simple: the spirits of your people howl for revenge

name: skywrath_crown_rival_075
text: You were always destined to crash.
text_simple: you were always destined to crash

name: skywrath_crown_rival_078
text: Skin the little rat for a scarf.
text_simple: skin the little rat for a scarf

name: skywrath_crown_rival_083
text: Intelligence welcomes hubris. Hubris invites risk.
text_simple: intelligence welcomes hubris hubris invites risk

name: skywrath_crown_rival_095
text: You fight for nothing. A true cause always triumphs in the end.
text_simple: you fight for nothing a true cause always triumphs in the end

name: skywrath_crown_rival_097
text: What did your greed gain you? A glimpse of power and a pathetic end.
text_simple: what did your greed gain you a glimpse of power and a pathetic end

name: skywrath_crown_rival_103
text: Power must be earned. There is no honor in theft.
text_simple: power must be earned there is no honor in theft

name: skywrath_crown_rival_108
text: The world is safer without your pet.
text_simple: the world is safer without your pet

name: skywrath_crown_rival_117
text: Your sisters are far beyond your reach.
text_simple: your sisters are far beyond your reach

name: skywrath_crown_rival_121
text: I took no pleasure in slaying that beast.
text_simple: i took no pleasure in slaying that beast

name: skywrath_crown_rival_122
text: Do you speak for Helio? Consider this an act of war.
text_simple: do you speak for helio consider this an act of war

name: skywrath_crown_rival_123
text: King of nothing but your own dreams.
text_simple: king of nothing but your own dreams

name: skywrath_crown_rival_125
text: Outsiders have no say in Skywrath affairs.
text_simple: outsiders have no say in skywrath affairs

name: skywrath_crown_rival_127
text: Scree'auk warned me about you, but your power was nothing fear.
text_simple: screeauk warned me about you but your power was nothing fear

name: skywrath_crown_rival_129
text: You were a fool to take this fight on land.
text_simple: you were a fool to take this fight on land

name: skywrath_crown_rival_131
text: You forgot your purpose. Punishment is swift.
text_simple: you forgot your purpose punishment is swift

name: skywrath_crown_rival_133
text: You were loyal to no one -- and no one will mourn your death.
text_simple: you were loyal to no one and no one will mourn your death

name: skywrath_crown_rival_141
text: There is but one conclusion: the omniscience sent you to your death.
text_simple: there is but one conclusion the omniscience sent you to your death

name: skywrath_crown_rival_147
text: A life without duty invites a meaningless end.
text_simple: a life without duty invites a meaningless end

name: skywrath_crown_rival_149
text: This is the fate of assassins and thieves.
text_simple: this is the fate of assassins and thieves

name: skywrath_crown_rival_155
text: There is no honor in this fight.
text_simple: there is no honor in this fight

name: skywrath_crown_rival_157
text: Elusive. But I quickly learned your tricks.
text_simple: elusive but i quickly learned your tricks

name: skywrath_crown_rival_159
text: You're an abomination. Only fit to die.
text_simple: youre an abomination only fit to die

name: skywrath_crown_rival_163
text: Queen of nothing. I leave you beyond pain.
text_simple: queen of nothing i leave you beyond pain

name: skywrath_crown_rival_173
text: Your poison must be kept far from Skywrath.
text_simple: your poison must be kept far from skywrath

name: skywrath_crown_rival_179
text: None may silence me save my queen.
text_simple: none may silence me save my queen

name: skywrath_crown_rival_181
text: Fly away, Shen. We don't come back from this.
text_simple: fly away shen we dont come back from this

name: skywrath_crown_rival_183
text: Next time send a flying fish.
text_simple: next time send a flying fish

name: skywrath_crown_rival_185
text: Send a letter to the Conclave. Another petty criminal is dead.
text_simple: send a letter to the conclave another petty criminal is dead

name: skywrath_crown_rival_187
text: You didn't lead me nearly enough.
text_simple: you didnt lead me nearly enough

name: skywrath_crown_rival_189
text: You're not worth a second thought.
text_simple: youre not worth a second thought

name: skywrath_crown_rival_199
text: You cannot mine the skies, my friend.
text_simple: you cannot mine the skies my friend

name: skywrath_crown_rival_201
text: You'll never see your temple again.
text_simple: youll never see your temple again

name: skywrath_crown_rival_202
text: Let your master find you here.
text_simple: let your master find you here

name: skywrath_crown_rival_203
text: Your deceptions were far too easy to read.
text_simple: your deceptions were far too easy to read

name: skywrath_crown_rival_205
text: No one will carry you back to the sea, save the droppings of the gulls.
text_simple: no one will carry you back to the sea save the droppings of the gulls

name: skywrath_crown_rival_207
text: In Skywrath, the unstable are contained.
text_simple: in skywrath the unstable are contained

name: skywrath_crown_rival_209
text: For the sake of the Eyrie, your contraptions must be destroyed.
text_simple: for the sake of the eyrie your contraptions must be destroyed

name: skywrath_crown_rival_213
text: What care have you for this fight?
text_simple: what care have you for this fight

name: skywrath_crown_rival_225
text: I will always protect Skywrath. Even from enemies within.
text_simple: i will always protect skywrath even from enemies within

name: skywrath_crown_rival_226
text: Whatever returned with Scree'auk...was not my Shen.
text_simple: whatever returned with screeauk was not my shen

name: skywrath_crown_rival_235
text: It's time to burn that book.
text_simple: its time to burn that book

name: skywrath_crown_rival_236
text: True intelligence is knowing the line. You never even saw the line.
text_simple: true intelligence is knowing the line you never even saw the line

name: skywrath_crown_rival_237
text: You underestimate the powers of this realm.
text_simple: you underestimate the powers of this realm

name: skywrath_crown_rival_241
text: My gratitude only goes so far.
text_simple: my gratitude only goes so far

name: skywrath_crown_rival_243
text: We have real doctors in Skywrath.
text_simple: we have real doctors in skywrath

name: skywrath_crown_rival_245
text: A true king serves. You serve nothing but yourself.
text_simple: a true king serves you serve nothing but yourself

name: skywrath_crown_rival_247
text: Yours is a pantheon of failure, Zeus.
text_simple: yours is a pantheon of failure zeus

name: skywrath_crown_rival_301
text: And your people? Will they betray us next?
text_simple: and your people will they betray us next

name: skywrath_crown_rival_302
text: You dare to threaten the people of Skywrath? Now you see how that ends.
text_simple: you dare to threaten the people of skywrath now you see how that ends

name: skywrath_crown_scepter_01
text: Aghanim is peculiar, but his power cannot be denied.
text_simple: aghanim is peculiar but his power cannot be denied

name: skywrath_crown_scepter_03
text: This scepter shall aid in our quest.
text_simple: this scepter shall aid in our quest

name: skywrath_crown_shard_01
text: Even a shard of power could turn the tide.
text_simple: even a shard of power could turn the tide

name: skywrath_crown_shard_02
text: I'd much rather not pay for this.
text_simple: id much rather not pay for this

name: skywrath_crown_slark_rival_01
text: Now you smell like a DEAD fish. It's not an improvement.
text_simple: now you smell like a dead fish its not an improvement

name: skywrath_crown_slark_rival_02_02
text: Hahahaha. The catch of the day.
text_simple: hahahaha the catch of the day

name: skywrath_crown_sniper_rival_01
text: Not so dangerous when I'm right up close, are you?
text_simple: not so dangerous when im right up close are you

name: skywrath_crown_sniper_rival_02
text: Sniper. Is that a keen word for coward?
text_simple: sniper is that a keen word for coward

name: skywrath_crown_spiritbreaker_rival_01
text: I just broke YOUR spirit. No. That was your spine. And your tibia, by the looks of it.
text_simple: i just broke your spirit no that was your spine and your tibia by the looks of it

name: skywrath_crown_spiritbreaker_rival_02
text: I break your spirit. I crush your bones. I end your sad little life.
text_simple: i break your spirit i crush your bones i end your sad little life

name: skywrath_crown_teleport_pain_05
text: Now to get beyond further harm's reach.
text_simple: now to get beyond further harms reach

name: skywrath_crown_teleport_pain_07
text: I'll rejoin the fight when I'm healed.
text_simple: ill rejoin the fight when im healed

name: skywrath_crown_teleport_pain_08
text: There's no shame in a strategic withdrawal.
text_simple: theres no shame in a strategic withdrawal

name: skywrath_crown_twingate_02
text: The better to enter the battle sooner.
text_simple: the better to enter the battle sooner

name: skywrath_crown_twingate_03
text: I'll save my efforts for fighting, not flying.
text_simple: ill save my efforts for fighting not flying

name: skywrath_crown_watcher_03
text: Let no foe escape my sight.
text_simple: let no foe escape my sight

name: skywrath_crown_watcher_fatality_02
text: Fallen in pursuit of a higher aim.
text_simple: fallen in pursuit of a higher aim

name: skywrath_crown_watcher_kill_01
text: A fitting reward for these scars.
text_simple: a fitting reward for these scars

name: skywrath_crown_watcher_kill_02
text: Not easy, but well worth it.
text_simple: not easy but well worth it

name: skywrath_crown_water_02
text: A balm for body and soul.
text_simple: a balm for body and soul

name: skywrath_crown_water_03
text: Let my foes feel the full measure of my strength.
text_simple: let my foes feel the full measure of my strength

name: skywrath_crown_wheel_all_01
text: Pleased to make a very brief acquaintance.
text_simple: pleased to make a very brief acquaintance

name: skywrath_crown_wheel_all_02
text: You look like someone I once killed.
text_simple: you look like someone i once killed

name: skywrath_crown_wheel_all_06
text: The records of this war won't even mention you.
text_simple: the records of this war wont even mention you

name: skywrath_crown_wheel_all_07
text: Some gold for me, and carrion for the crows.
text_simple: some gold for me and carrion for the crows

name: skywrath_crown_wheel_all_08
text: The scavengers can take your corpse. I have no need.
text_simple: the scavengers can take your corpse i have no need

name: skywrath_crown_wheel_all_10
text: There is nowhere you can run that I cannot follow.
text_simple: there is nowhere you can run that i cannot follow

name: skywrath_crown_wheel_all_11
text: Flee, cowards! You want nothing to do with me.
text_simple: flee cowards you want nothing to do with me

name: skywrath_crown_wheel_all_13
text: I command the magics of the heavens AND the hells.
text_simple: i command the magics of the heavens and the hells

name: skywrath_crown_wheel_all_14
text: Keep your beak pointed at your own business.
text_simple: keep your beak pointed at your own business

name: skywrath_crown_wheel_all_15
text: For Scree'auk, and the rightful queen!
text_simple: for screeauk and the rightful queen

name: skywrath_crown_wheel_all_16
text: I leave you crawling like an animal -- in the dirt.
text_simple: i leave you crawling like an animal in the dirt

name: skywrath_crown_wheel_all_17
text: I soar above Skywrath -- and the likes of you.
text_simple: i soar above skywrath and the likes of you

name: skywrath_crown_wheel_all_18
text: I have my doubts about you.
text_simple: i have my doubts about you

name: skywrath_crown_wheel_all_18_02
text: I have my doubts about you.
text_simple: i have my doubts about you

name: skywrath_crown_wheel_thanks_01
text: Why do you expect praise for mundane tasks?
text_simple: why do you expect praise for mundane tasks

name: skywrath_crown_wisdom_02
text: My prowess grows by leaps and bounds.
text_simple: my prowess grows by leaps and bounds

name: skywrath_crown_witch_doctor_rival_01
text: You're dead, witch doctor. Here's a second opinion. You fought horribly.
text_simple: youre dead witch doctor heres a second opinion you fought horribly

name: skywrath_crown_witch_doctor_rival_02
text: Here's my prescription, witch doctor: Take two potions every six hours, and shove them up your backside.
text_simple: heres my prescription witch doctor take two potions every six hours and shove them up your backside

name: skywrath_crown_witch_doctor_rival_02_02
text: Here's my prescription, witch doctor: Take two potions every six hours, as a suppository!
text_simple: heres my prescription witch doctor take two potions every six hours as a suppository
